org.digijava.module.currencyrates.fxtop

Interface FxtopServicesPortType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FxtopServicesBindingStub, FxtopServicesPortTypeProxy

    public interface FxtopServicesPortType
extends java.rmi.Remote

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConvertResult convert(java.lang.String originalAmount, java.lang.String c1, java.lang.String c2, java.lang.String date, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Returns amount (OriginalAmount) converted from source currency (C1 is a 3 letters Iso Code) to destination currency (C2 is a 3 letters Iso Code) at a specific date (Date format DD/MM/YYYY) or today if Date parameter is left blank.
      CurrencyDescription descCurrency(java.lang.String lang, java.lang.String isocode)
      Returns description of a currency (Isocode defined by a 3 letter) in language Lang (supported languages : EN, FR, DE,ES, IT, PT, DK, SE, FI, NO, NL)
      java.lang.String listCurrencies(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Returns a string with list of ISO code of supported currencies (3 letters Iso codes like USD) separated by a slash, User and Password is optional and is not used yet

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        ConvertResult convert(java.lang.String originalAmount,
                      java.lang.String c1,
                      java.lang.String c2,
                      java.lang.String date,
                      java.lang.String user,
                      java.lang.String password)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns amount (OriginalAmount) converted from source currency (C1 is a 3 letters Iso Code) to destination currency (C2 is a 3 letters Iso Code) at a specific date (Date format DD/MM/YYYY) or today if Date parameter is left blank. .
        Parameters:
        originalAmount -
        c1 - source currency - 3 letters Iso Code
        c2 - destination currency - 3 letters Iso Code
        date - (Date format DD/MM/YYYY) or today if Date parameter is left blank
        user - user name that is suscribed to the service
        password - password of the subscription
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • descCurrency

        CurrencyDescription descCurrency(java.lang.String lang,
                                 java.lang.String isocode)
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns description of a currency (Isocode defined by a 3 letter) in language Lang (supported languages : EN, FR, DE,ES, IT, PT, DK, SE, FI, NO, NL)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • listCurrencies

        java.lang.String listCurrencies(java.lang.String user,
                                java.lang.String password)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a string with list of ISO code of supported currencies (3 letters Iso codes like USD) separated by a slash, User and Password is optional and is not used yet
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
